allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Telegram Media Downloader

Add Python script to download photos and videos from Telegram chats/groups with the following features:
- Download photos, videos, or both
- Filter by date range
- List available chats
- Automatic folder organization
- Progress tracking and summary

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add document download support with file extension filtering

New features:
- Download documents by file extension (pdf, docx, zip, etc.)
- Filter specific file types with --extensions parameter
- New --media-type options: document, all
- Files renamed with date prefix: YYYYMMDD_<original_filename>.<ext>
- Support for downloading photos, videos, and documents in any combination

Examples:
- Download PDFs: --media-type document --extensions pdf
- Download multiple types: --extensions pdf,docx,zip
- Download everything: --media-type all

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
